Lester Mattice

  1. Foster Name: Lester (Stub)
  2. Foster Family: Lou L. and Agnes Belle Studer
  3. Location of Family: Falls City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 19 months
  7. Date of Birth: 8/10/1913
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: We Are Part of History: The Story of the Orphan Trains by Michael Patrick, Evelyn Sheets and Evelyn Trickel, p. 138-140; Orphan Train Riders Cookbook and Other Good Stuff, p. 45-46.
